text: Buffington may refer to: ==Places in the United States== ;Communities *Buffington, Georgia *Buffington, Missouri *Buffington Township, Indiana County, Pennsylvania ;Landmarks *Buffington Harbor, Gary, Indiana *Buffington Hotel, a historic building in Westville, Oklahoma *Buffington Island, in the Ohio River, between West Virginia and Ohio **Battle of Buffington Island, a battle of the American Civil War ==People== *Buffington (surname)
title: Buffington
